Author: aceshighsays
Text: I think you're right. But how to limit my calorie intake?

Author: etherealaqua
Text: probably not a tip you want to hear but...stop fasting. mental restriction is still restriction and we all know that restricting leads to binging. You’re binging despite not being hungry bc you’re so afraid of being hungry later when you’re not “allowed” to eat. You’ll binge less if you’re not in the black and white mindset of only allowing yourself to eat at certain times. At least that’s how it works for me.
